Low FX fee

Smart Hunt subscribers can invest in US assets with a reduced FX fee. Exchanges of £ for $ will have a 0.25% FX fee instead of 0.95%.

Overview score for each asset

Look at a point scale score based on the assets’ indicators, and decide whether to buy or sell an asset.

Enhanced asset analytics

Look at the main indicators that show how the asset is performing at any given moment, and understand if the company is worth investing in.

Financial reporting

No more complex canvases with a bunch of incomprehensible numbers. Now, all the reporting is brought to you in an exclusive, reader-friendly format.

Enhanced portfolio analytics

See the dynamics of your portfolio — any changes and all the different indicators are available for your perusal. Evaluate the risks with the help of Beta coefficient.

Investor calendar

Monitor the dates of dividend payments, their amount, the dates of closing the register or of financial statement releases, and also other corporate actions.
